title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding

questions.question: What does Ross say he's doing when Carol and Susan tell him they're getting married?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I'm revelling baby, believe me!' when Carol and Susan tell him they're getting married.

questions.question: Why does Monica need help with the catering for the lesbian wedding?
options: The original caterer had a mountain bike accident
The original caterer is on vacation
questions.correct_answer: The original caterer had a mountain bike accident
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Carol and Susan's caterer had a mountain bike accident this weekend, and she's in a full body cast.'

questions.question: What is Joey's role on the TV show 'Days of our Lives'?
options: Dr. Drake Ramoray, a plastic surgeon
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I'm Dr. Drake Ramoray, your sister's neurosurgeon' on the TV show.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think happened to Mrs. Adelman's spirit after she died?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I think when your wife's spirit left her body, it um, kind of stuck around in me.'

questions.question: Why does Rachel's mom consider leaving her father?
options: Because she's unhappy in the marriage
Because she's in love with someone else
Because she wants to be more like Rachel
Because she's tired of her father's career
questions.correct_answer: Because she's unhappy in the marriage
questions.explanation: Rachel's mom says 'I did marry your Barry. I did the right thing, I did what I was supposed to do, and it wasn't what I wanted.'

questions.question: What does Monica plan to do if Ross doesn't help her with the cooking?
options: Create a new appetizer called 'pigs in Ross'
Fire Ross from the cooking team
Make Ross do all the cooking
questions.correct_answer: Create a new appetizer called 'pigs in Ross'
questions.explanation: Monica says 'If you don't help me cook, I'm gonna take a bunch of those little hot dogs, and I'm gonna create a new appetizer called "pigs in Ross".'

questions.question: Why do Carol's parents not attend the wedding?
options: They do not approve of the marriage
questions.correct_answer: They do not approve of the marriage
questions.explanation: Carol says 'My parents called this afternoon to say they weren't coming. I mean, I knew they were having trouble with this whole thing, but they're my parents.'

questions.question: What does Ross say to Carol about her parents not attending the wedding?
options: You should call off the wedding
You should try to convince them to come
If my parents didn't want me to marry you, no way that would have stopped me
You should be angry with them
questions.correct_answer: If my parents didn't want me to marry you, no way that would have stopped me
questions.explanation: Ross says 'If my parents didn't want me to marry you, no way that would have stopped me. Look, this is your wedding. Do it.'

questions.question: What is the name of the character Joey plays on 'Days of our Lives'?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I'm Dr. Drake Ramoray, your sister's neurosurgeon' on the TV show.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's client's death?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'She was 82 years old.'

questions.question: What does Rachel's mom want to know from Rachel?
options: If she's happy with her life
questions.correct_answer: If she's happy with her life
questions.explanation: Rachel's mom says 'I guess I just figured of all people you would understand this.'

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who died on Phoebe's massage table?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'One of my clients died on the massage table today. Her name was um, Mrs. Adelman.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say to the woman who rejects him at the wedding?
options: I'm a great guy, you're missing out
I'm not interested in you either
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Penis schmenis. We're all people. We're all people.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to help Mrs. Adelman's spirit?
options: She takes her to the Museum of Modern Art
She takes her to the Statue of Liberty
She takes her to Rockefeller Center
She takes her to all of the above
questions.correct_answer: She takes her to all of the above
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I took her everywhere. The Museum of Modern Art, Rockefeller Center, Statue of Liberty.'

questions.question: Why does Ross dance with Susan at the wedding?
options: Because he wanted to make Carol jealous
Because he wanted to celebrate the wedding
questions.explanation: Susan says 'You wanna dance?' and Ross agrees.

questions.question: What is the name of the minister who performs the wedding ceremony?
questions.explanation: The transcript says 'MINISTER: You know, nothing makes God happier than when two people, any two people, come together in love.'

questions.question: What does Monica say to Ross when he doesn't want to help with the cooking?
options: If you don't help me cook, I'll never speak to you again
If you don't help me cook, I'll create a new appetizer called 'pigs in Ross'
If you don't help me cook, I'll call off the wedding
If you don't help me cook, I'll fire you from the cooking team
questions.correct_answer: If you don't help me cook, I'll create a new appetizer called 'pigs in Ross'
questions.explanation: Monica says 'If you don't help me cook, I'm gonna take a bunch of those little hot dogs, and I'm gonna create a new appetizer called "pigs in Ross".'

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Mr. Adelman about his wife's spirit?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I think when your wife's spirit left her body, it um, kind of stuck around in me.'

questions.question: What does Rachel's mom say to Rachel about her marriage to Barry?
options: I'm sorry you didn't marry him
I wish you had married someone else
questions.explanation: Rachel's mom says 'I did marry your Barry.'

questions.question: What does Joey say to the woman at the wedding about the 'pigs in a blanket'?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'How's that pig-in-the-blanket workin' out for you? I wrapped those bad boys.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say to the attractive woman at the wedding?
options: I'm a great guy, you're missing out
I'm not interested in you either
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Penis schmenis. We're all people. We're all people.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to the woman who is coming on to her at the wedding?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Ok, that's so nice.' and agrees to get a drink with the woman.

questions.question: What does Rachel's mom say to Rachel about her life?
options: I want to be like you
I wish you had married Barry
questions.explanation: Rachel's mom says 'I am just so proud of you.'

questions.question: What does Monica say to the gang about who will get married first?
options: I think I'll be the first one to get married
I think Ross will be the first one to get married
I think Rachel will be the first one to get married
I think we should have a discussion about it
questions.correct_answer: I think we should have a discussion about it
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Ok, which one of us do you think is gonna be the first one to get married?'

questions.question: What does Joey say to the gang about who will be the last one to get married?
options: I think I'll be the last one to get married
I think Chandler will be the last one to get married
I think Ross will be the last one to get married
I think Monica will be the last one to get married
questions.correct_answer: I think Chandler will be the last one to get married
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Which one of us do you think will be the last to get married?' and the gang looks at Chandler.
